abstract: John F Thomas of Queens is sentenced to 55 years to life in prison for shooting New York City Police Sergeant Craig Bier in 2012; Thomas was convicted of first-degree attempted murder and aggravated assault of police officer.
lead_paragraph: John F. Thomas, 28, received the maximum sentence for shooting Sgt. Craig Bier as he was being pursued by the police in 2012.

headline.main: Queens Man Sentenced to 55 Years to Life for Shooting Officer in Legs
headline.print_headline: Sentencing for Man Who Shot Officer
